Key Match Events: Bradley Beal came off the bench for the first time in nine years and scored a team-high 25 points.
The Phoenix Suns snapped a four-game losing streak with a 109-99 victory over the Philadelphia 76ers.
Post-Match Reflections: Bradley Beal made the most of the unfamiliar role of substitute for the Phoenix Suns but made it clear he believes he is an NBA starter.
